concept.title: Upgrading
concept.shortdesc: Upgrade to take advantage of new features and bug fixes, and to upgrade your cluster to the latest version of when one is available.

conbody.p: There are 4 possible upgrade types for installations:

ul.li: Online - For standalone or HA installations with a connection to the internet.
Offline - For air-gapped standalone or HA installations without a connection to the internet.
Online legacy - For HA installations made prior to April 2021with a connection to the internet.
Offline legacy - For air-gapped HA installations prior to April 2021 without a connection to the internet.
